org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.data.traintest

Interface TTDataSet

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericTTDataSet

    @BuiltBy(value=GenericTTDataBuilder.class)
public interface TTDataSet
    Interface for train-test data sets. This is a single train-test pair.
    Since:
    0.8

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configure(LenskitConfiguration config)
      Configure LensKit to have the training data from this data source.

      Get the data set attributes (used for identification in output).

      Get the isolation group ID for this data set.

      Get the data set name.

      Get the query data.

      Get the query data.

      Get the test data.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Get the data set name.
        Returns:
        A name for the data set. Used in the output file.

      • getAttributes

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getAttributes()
        Get the data set attributes (used for identification in output).
        Returns:
        A key → value map of the attributes used to identify this data set. For example, a crossfold data set may include the source name and fold number.

      • getIsolationGroup

        java.util.UUID getIsolationGroup()
        Get the isolation group ID for this data set. Data sets in the same group will be allowed to run in parallel. This is used to implement data set isolation.
        Returns:
        The group ID for this data set.

      • getTrainingData

        DataSource getTrainingData()
        Get the training data.
        Returns:
        A data source containing the training data.

      • getTrainingDAO

        EventDAO getTrainingDAO()
        Get the training data.
        Returns:
        An event DAO encompassing the training data.

      • getQueryData

        DataSource getQueryData()
        Get the query data.
        Returns:
        A data source containing the query data.

      • getQueryDAO

        EventDAO getQueryDAO()
        Get the query data.
        Returns:
        An event DAO encompassing the query data.

      • getTestData

        DataSource getTestData()
        Get the training data.
        Returns:
        A data source containing the test data.

      • getTestDAO

        EventDAO getTestDAO()
        Get the test data.
        Returns:
        A DAO factory returning the test data.

      • lastModified

        long lastModified()
        Get the last modification time of this data set.
        Returns:
        The last modification time, in milliseconds since the epoch.

      • configure

        void configure(LenskitConfiguration config)
        Configure LensKit to have the training data from this data source.
        Parameters:
        config - A configuration in which the training data for this data set should be configured.
